The '''Taurus Iracundus Chapter''' is [[Arataki Itto]]'s [[Story Quest]].

==Act I: Rise Up, Golden Soul==
{{Main|Rise Up, Golden Soul}}
{{Description|The Oni race has a diverse character in Inazuma: sometimes valiant, sometimes proud, sometimes eccentric, sometimes wicked.<br />These countless interpretations of who they are have left strong symbolic impressions behind, but have also caused their distinctive "humanity" to recede into the backdrop.<br />Which side of the oni will you witness as you search for the "oni who dwells among humans?"}}
